title: varamu losagi
sahitya:
varamulosagi brOcuTa nI karudA jagadAdhara



anupallavi



parama dayAkara suguNA bharaNa nE kOrina



caraNam



udara pOSaNArthamai orula manasu karaga balkinadi oka bhArata

maunEtutaku sukhamu gAnaka nE

 madini cinta nonducuvE maru nItO balkidA madana janaka venkaTEsha

manasu galigi uNDE
